txt.en: 'The workers are being pestered by crebain. Defeat the crebain and ravens around Parth Rest.\n\n'Should things continue as they are, we will never complete our task here.'
You have done what you can to quell the encroaching crebain. You should report your success to Faniel.\n\nFaniel can be found in Parth Rest.
Faniel is concerned that the crebain are disrupting the workers of Parth Rest.
Talk to Faniel in Parth Rest

'Thank you for your help [placeholder].

'We must not grow complacent in our efforts to ensure this camp remains unhindered in its work.

'The fewer of those things out there, the better!'
Defeat crebain or ravens around Parth Rest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Faniel has asked you to defeat crebain around Parth Rest.
